message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but $90 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $70.

I understand that $90 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but $85 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $82, which is my lowest price. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $82 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $80 for the product.
